pageContext.claim: “Look at that. The red lights are on. Don't worry, I won't say anything bad about you, CNN. Because as soon as I see -- As soon as I'm getting ready to say something about fake news, etc., etc., the lights start going off. So I'm not going to -- Whoops, one just went off. You can tell by the lights. They got that little beautiful red light.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump sometimes falsely claims that he can see a camera light indicating that CNN is cutting away from his rally in real time.
